archimate:BusinessObject.name: Stakeholder needs
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Needs determined from communication with external and internal stakeholders in understanding their expectations, needs, requirements, values, problems, issues, and perceived risks and opportunities

properties.value: Laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE: "Die Stakeholder-Bedarfe sind Bedarfe, die sich aus der Kommunikation mit externen und internen Stakeholdern ergeben. Sie dienen zum Verständnis der Erwartungen, Bedarfe, Anforderungen, Werte, Probleme, Fragen, sowie wahrgenommenen Risiken und Chancen der Stakeholder".
Needs determined from communication with external and internal stakeholders in understanding their expectations, needs, requirements, values, problems, issues, and perceived risks and opportunities
